myUtils 0.2.5
  • Reference

rm_timestamp

rm_timestamp.Rd

rm_timestamp removes timestamps from strings.

Usage

rm_timestamp(strings, sep = "_", timestamp_format = "%Y-%m-%d_%H.%M.%S")

Arguments

strings

A vector of stings.

sep

A string with the timestamp seperator.

timestamp_format

A string with the timestamp format, as input for as.POSIXct.

Value

A vecotr of strings with the timestamps removed.

On this page
